explains: n. 遗物，遗迹，遗风；圣物，圣骨；（事物存在或发生的）证据，痕记；残留物，废墟（relics）
wordGroup: cultural relic 文物；文化遗产

sentences.en: The building stands as the last remaining relic of the town's cotton industry.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑物是小镇棉纺业仅存的遗迹。

sentences.en: It's relic from earlier times and it has survived all these years without much change.
sentences.cn: 这是更早期的遗迹，这些年一直存在，没有太多变化。

sentences.en: Let' s say our scientific analysis has produced an age range when a cultural relic was produced.
sentences.cn: 让我们来假设我们的科学分析已经得出了某项文物产生的年代范围。
